wikipedia_page.main: Colonel Gerald Hugh Grosvenor, 4th Duke of Westminster  (13 February 1907 – 25 February 1967) was a British landowner and aristocrat.

response: *Lord Hugh William (6 April 1884 – 30 October 1914), who married Lady Mabel Florence Mary, the daughter of John Crichton, 4th Earl Erne, and who was the father of Gerald Grosvenor, 4th Duke of Westminster and Robert Grosvenor, 5th Duke of Westminster.  He was killed in action in the First World War.

List of alumni of the Royal Military Academy Sandhurst

response: Sally Grosvenor, Duchess of Westminster (née Perry; 1909 – 30 May 1990), was the wife of Gerald Grosvenor, 4th Duke of Westminster.
